value:
Can't predict what happens in a
place you don't know. I better
make rations for everybody.

In my country, too, there is war. So
much death... I hope peace can be
made in this world.

You look tired. Are you tired?
Mordecai can help.

Lying in the sun is nice. Mordecai
found a good place by the fountain.
Let me show you. Come.

The air of the forest calms me.
Take a nap with the squirrels,
forget about bad things.

I thought you would need rations. I
made them for you. And also, I have
$Nf's greeting.

Oh, yes. This strength is enough to
help me protect everyone.

Mmm...stronger now. Forgive me
if I close my eyes when I fight.
Hmmm... Got to try harder.

I don't like fighting, but since you
asked, I will do what I can.

I am Mordecai, a warrior of Gallia.
Do you understand? Beorc words
are difficult.

Hello, $Nu.$k$pIt's rare to see you here, in the deep
forest. Taking a walk?$k$pI like this place. Air is quiet and gentle
here, like where I come from. Here,
I can relax.$k$pWithout words, my forest friends can
understand me. Not so with beorc.
So hard to share thoughts...$k$pSometimes, you beorc say the
opposite of what you think.
Understanding is so difficult for me.$k$pWhen I get tired, I always come here.
If you get tired, you come here, too.$k$pLie in the sun, get comfortable, rest...
It is our secret place. Promise me,
OK?
オおぉっ！
Sorry...
うああっ！
It hurts...
Rrrrrrr...
You are my enemy!
I fight hard!
I close my eyes.
Mordecai can fight no longer...
Hahaha
I am Mordecai, warrior of Gallia. Do I speak well in this tongue?
Your way of greeting is like mine.
As a cat, I need no hard words.
Mordecai and you are the same. We will become friends.
You are a good beorc...strong and loyal. You are worth fighting for.
I have no taste for watching my enemies tear into long shreds.
Mordecai likes you as much as the sun's light.
Got it.
What now?
Let's fight hard.
